text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I am "The Empress" Air Groove. I hold this title so that I can be 
an ideal and compass for all horse girls.
Air Groove is constantly striving to be her ideal "Empress".

I can't say I fully understand the meaning. But after seeing the 
same things she does and thinking on it, I came to one answer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I see…! Thank you very much, I'll give it a try…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes! Thank you, Air Groove!

The bright facial expressions of her kouhai, and above all, the 
soft eyes she has watching over them.

I'm certain now that her guidance towards her kouhai and her 
student council activities are very important to her.
Then一

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
一Eh? You're going to look over my personal 
training menu in place of Air Groove?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Wow, thank you very much!! Then first, about training your 
muscles for better acceleration…

text_block_list.name: Student Council Member
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, putting all the materials together is so difficult… maybe 
I'll go consult the vice president…
choice_data_list: If you don't mind, I can help instead.
If you don't mind, I can help instead.

text_block_list.name: Student Council Member
text_block_list.text:
Ehh!? You will!? Then, please do! About 
sorting the results of this vote一

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hey, you. What are you thinking?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Don't play dumb. Did you think I wouldn't notice? 
You, you've been standing in for my junior guidance 
and student council duties haven't you?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Why would you do something like that. Are you trying to say 
you'll handle all the "useless" things yourself?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Well, answer me! Depending on your reply, the 
contract will be terminated immediately!
choice_data_list: Because the things you cherish, I want to cherish as well
Because the things you cherish, I want to cherish as well

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …What?
choice_data_list: Let me help you, as your trainer.
Let me help you, as your trainer.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Help…?

I told Air Groove I want her to continue as she has up until now, 
but to just rely on me to help free up training time.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Hmph. "Rely on me", huh. 
That sort of thing should be said after you're more reliable.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
But… 
Hm…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: The contract will continue. That's all.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
…A reliable partner that continues 
to walk along the path of ambition.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Trainer… huh.

Just like that, helping Air Groove little by little she was able 
to train more enthusiastically than ever.
And then in the loser's race, Air Groove一

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The #1 most popular Air Groove has darted up to 
the front straight from the start! Can she overcome 
her humiliation from the debut race!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Fu…!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
And she keeps going! Air Groove is just too fast!! She's creating 
a gap that truly shows the difference in their class!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Gooooaaaaaaaaalll!!!! An overwhelming victory! Overwhelming!! 
With an amazing 5 body difference!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The incomparable "Empress" Air Groove!! 
Her legend has just begun!!

The day after the spectacular victory. I received a message from 
Air Groove saying "I have something I want you to help with".
Let's hurry to her…!!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
So you came. 
…Hm? Why are you so out of breath?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Well whatever. Let's get started. The 
seeds I ordered just arrived.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Flowers.

And so, I started planting flower seeds in the 
flower bed behind the school with Air Groove.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Hey, how many times do I have to tell you! 
Don't cover so much soil after sowing the seeds!!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
In the first place, you're doing too much on each task! Listen, 
when dealing with seeds you have to be more careful一

Although I got scolded very often, I somehow 
managed to finish the work safely…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Alright, we're pretty much finished. 
…I'm looking forward to when they sprout and bloom.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
What, are you trying to say that's unexpected or something? 
…It's written all over your face.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
…If you nurture them with care and effort, the shoots will grow 
steadily and eventually bloom beautifully.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
The flowers bloom leaving behind their seeds, and 
from there new dreams are born once again.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
一What made me sprout, was the the figure 
of my mother running on the turf.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You probably know already that winners of the G1 race 
"Oaks" are given the title "Queen of Oaks".

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
My mother grabbed the title of "Queen" 
in the midst of fierce competition.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I yearned to reach that level, and when I learned about that 
run… I trembled. And I idolized that strength.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I dreamed of sharpening myself to my limits and claiming a 
glorious victory. A hope for racing bloomed in me.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
And above all… I wished to be someone to look up 
to just like my mother was when I was a child.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
That's why, I chose to be "The Empress". 
To be an ideal and a goal for horse girls to aim towards.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Just like my mother once did for me in the past… To show people 
the hope of knowing that there is a shining future.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
…If that's the case, then just winning races 
isn't enough. Upholding the school's name and guiding 
my juniors, are all part of my duty.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
If someone is going to call that useless and throw it away, then 
I thought I didn't need a trainer…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
But… um. If it's just you… I don't 
mind trusting you a little bit…
choice_data_list: Please rely on me more and more from now on!
Please rely on me more and more from now on!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Sh-shut up!! I'm telling you to say that after 
I see how reliable you actually are!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Good grief, the future isn't gonna be easy…!
choice_data_list: I'm just glad there is a future!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Don't steal my thunder, fool!
And so, the days with the "Empress" Air Groove began!
